casebody.data:
Michael Gene JORDAN
v.
SECRETARY OF CORRECTION, Theodis Beck; Superintendent L.C.I. George Kenworty. No. 656P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Michael Gene Jordan, Pro Se. William Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 22nd day of November 2005 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of January 2006."
